channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.7
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 11.22 with PostGIS 2.5.9
  • PostgreSQL 12.17 with PostGIS 3.0.10
  • PostgreSQL 13.13 with PostGIS 3.1.10
  • PostgreSQL 14.10 with PostGIS 3.2.6
  • PostgreSQL 15.5 with PostGIS 3.3.5
  • PostgreSQL 16.1 with PostGIS 3.4.1

For improved security, Postgres.app 2.7 shows a permission dialog when you connect for the first time.

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
